Articles.Content: Please make the Turbo-Ramjet have a controllable mode switch between turbo and ram
The turboramjet already has the best of both, you wouldn't gain anything.

The turboramjet already has the best of both, you wouldn't gain anything.

I want control, I hate auto switching so much that I disable it on Rapiers and control via action group
There aren't distinct modes, the thrust of the turboramjet varies along a single smooth curve. So a mode switch would switch between that curve...and the same curve.

Would you please enlighten us as to how a turbo-ramjet works? Seems to me like it would be a combination of a turbojet and a ramjet, with the characteristics of each.

Turboramjet usually refers to something like the J58 from the SR-71, which at higher speeds used complex air intake plumbing to bypass most of the compressor stage and work pretty similarly to a ramjet. The intake system in that engine was controlled by an analog computer rather than pilot control, not sure if there has been a real life example that is done manually.

The point being that there is a distinct switch between separate modes, not the current arrangement which is is mostly mushy and indistinguishable
Come on, the turboramjet was buffed already in 1.0.3-4 ! It is awesome now... I'm not sure we need an option to switch between turbo and ram, it's just fine to me
